widget.name: Todo List Item
widget.description: A single todo item widget designed to be used inside data list placeholders for maximum flexibility

property.caption: Todo Text
property.description: Attribute containing the todo item text

property.caption: Completed Status
property.description: Boolean attribute indicating if the todo is completed

property.caption: Due Date
property.description: Date attribute for todo due date (optional)

property.caption: Created Date
property.description: Date attribute for when the todo was created (optional)

property.caption: Changed Date
property.description: Date attribute for when the todo was last modified (optional)

property.caption: On Change
property.description: Action to execute when any todo item property is changed (toggle completion, edit text, edit date, etc.)

property.caption: On Delete Todo
property.description: Action to execute when deleting a todo item

property.caption: Show Due Date
property.description: Display due date information for todo items

property.caption: Show Created Date
property.description: Display created date information for todo items

property.caption: Show Changed Date
property.description: Display last modified date information for todo items

property.caption: Show Owner
property.description: Display owner/creator information for todo items

property.caption: Allow Inline Editing
property.description: Allow users to edit todo items inline

property.caption: Compact View
property.description: Use a more compact layout for the todo item

property.caption: Show Action Buttons
property.description: Display edit and delete action buttons
